document_data.name: Cazi Alphelandra
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite web/GTM Icons of the Realms: SKT}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Cazi Alphelandra''' was a [[wild elf]] [[giant-killer|giantslayer]] who roamed around the [[Savage Frontier]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]],
document_data.Personality: Cazi was a loud, boastful woman that liked to wield large weaponry.
document_data.Possessions: Cazi carried around a huge, custom-made [[bow]] by the name of "Large Banta," that she was quite skilled with despite its size. It was designed specifically to aid her in the fighting of [[dragon]]s and [[giant]]s.
document_data.Relationships: Cazi was a member of the giantslayer organization [[Hook, Line, and Sinker (organization)|Hook, Line, and Sinker]].
